caption.title: Position-dependent entropy.
caption.p: Moving average position information entropy was calculated with a window size of 11 for HA1 protein if influenza A virus in each period, that is period 2 (black), period 3 (yellow), period 4 (red), period 5 (green) and period 6 (blue). The amino acid position are in H1 numbering system [ 37].
